Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires cable television companies to offer cable television channels on an individual basis
Summary: Requires cable television companies to offer cable television channels on an individual basis; provides that the public service commission be responsible for approving rates.
LawCode: Add ยง225-a, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, in relation to providing customers the right to choose the stations that they wish to receive
